korean: 오늘 날씨가 너무 더워서 밖에 나가기 싫었다.
핸드폰 보니까 31도래. 체감온도는 더 높을 거야.
조금만 걸어도 땀이 비 오듯이 나온다.
오후에 편의점 가려고 5분만 걸었는데 등에 땀이 흠뻑.
친구가 치맥 하자고 했는데 나가기 싫어서 거절했다.
저녁 때 조금 선선해지길래 잠깐 산책 나갔는데 그래도 더웠어.
날씨 예보 보니까 다음 주도 계속 덥대. 진짜 힘들다.
english: The weather was so hot today that I didn't want to go outside.
I checked my phone and it said 31 degrees. The feels-like temp is probably even higher.
I turned on the AC and just stayed home.
I ate ice cream while watching Netflix.
Even walking a little makes sweat pour down like rain.
I walked for just 5 minutes to the convenience store in the afternoon and my back was drenched.
I bought a cold drink and chugged it right away.
A friend asked if I wanted to get chicken and beer, but I didn't wanna go out, so I said no.
It got a bit cooler in the evening, so I went for a quick walk, but it was still hot.
I wish fall would come soon.
How long is it gonna stay this hot?
I checked the forecast and it's gonna be hot all next week too. This is seriously tough.
